list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: grip (something, typically someone's flesh) tightly and sharply between finger and thumb.
move one's finger and thumb apart or bring them together on (a touchscreen) in order to zoom into or out of an image, activate a function, etc.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: to explore in more detail just pinch the screen
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: để khám phá chi tiết hơn chỉ cần nhúm màn hình

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he pinched a handful of candies
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta véo một số ít kẹo

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: if I pinch and scrape, I might manage
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nếu tôi véo và cạo, tôi có thể quản lý

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: sail (a boat) so close to the wind that the sails begin to lose power.
an act of gripping the skin of someone's body between finger and thumb.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he gave her a gentle pinch
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã cho cô ấy một quả véo nhẹ nhàng
